title: ARURF not counting for certain mission progress
body:
The mission says:

> The Roar of Demacia (5/10)
> Matchmade games only.
> Win a PVP Summoner's Rift game in under 30 minutes
> OR
> Win 3 PVP games

I played a matchmade game in a PVP mode on Summoner's Rift and won in under 30 minutes. However, it did not count towards the specified goal, and only counted towards the general "win 3 PVP games" goal. This is either a mission progress bug or a text bug.

replies.body: I was just about to complain about the same bug. I have that one and one from yesterday that says "Be on the team to take out the first town on summuners rift" That one doesn't counter on ARURF either.

> [{quoted}](name=Tilomentry,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EQ3XgWe1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-03T23:11:31.522+0000)
>
> I was just about to complain about the same bug. I have that one and one from yesterday that says "Be on the team to take out the first town on summuners rift" That one doesn't counter on ARURF either.

Day 6 mission for Garen. Same problem here. Looks like ARURF just doesn't count as SR.
